TextView.android:text: Offering a year-round outdoor pool, Welcomhotel by ITC Hotels, Alkapuri, Vadodara is set in Vadodara in the Gujarat Region. The hotel has a terrace and views of the pool. Free private parking is available on site. The hotel has 133 rooms including 6 suites and every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Seating area for your convenience. You will find a kettle in the room. Each room comes with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site Indian restaurant Peshawri or at WelcomCafe Cambay, a 24-hour multi cuisine restaurant. There is a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and gift shop at the property. Car hire is available at this hotel and the City is popular for Golfing. Vadodara Airport is 5 km from the property while the railway station is 1.5 km away.

Located in the heart of Vadodara City, Four Points by Sheraton Vadodara is a short 5-minute walk from Seven Seas Mall. Offering modern rooms with free Wi-Fi, it houses a gym and a restaurant. Fitted with wooden flooring, air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. In addition to a minibar, tea/coffee making facilities and a personal safe are included. DVD players and ironing facilities are available on request. Four Points by Sheraton Vadodara is a 15-minute drive from Vadodara Airport and about 2 km from Vadodara Railway Station. Rasa serves a variety of local and international dishes. It offers an รก la carte menu alongside buffet spreads for breakfast and dinner. In-room dining is possible. The 24-hour front desk offers laundry and luggage storage services.

Set in Vadodara 500 Meters from Vadodara Railway Station and Central Bus Depot and within 3.1 km of Laxmi Vilas Palace, Hotel Pearl has a shared lounge, rooms, and free WiFi. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. The property offers a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. All rooms at Hotel Pearl feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. A vegetarian breakfast is served every morning at the property.
